metadata.dc:title: Anemia megaloblastica constitucional por déficit de vitamina b12 (enfermedad de Imerslund). A propósito de un caso.
[Constitutional megaloblastic anaemia due to vitamin B12 deficit (Imerslund's disease). Report of a case. (author's transl)].
